name: Yasmine Mehmet
blurb: My typical client is a business owner, executive, professional, athlete, celebrity, or trust fund beneficiary going through a divorce in Los Angeles or Ventura county. I also specialize in preparing premarital or prenuptial agreements, postmarital agreements, and cohabitation agreements for clients who want protection from California community property and spousal support laws. My rate is $500/hour.
legal_orgs: Los Angeles divorce attorneys Walzer & Melcher LLP are committed to resolving divorce cases by settlement. When that cannot be achieved, we provide strong and effective representation at trial. WWe limit our practice to divorce cases in Los Angeles or Ventura counties, and premarital agreements or postmarital agreements under California law. Please visit http://www.walzermelcher.com/ for more information.

name: Christopher Moore
blurb:
Michael A. Morris was born in Winston Salem, North Carolina in 1953. He graduated from the University of California, Los Angeles (B.A., 1976) and Western State University (J.D., 1979). He was admitted to the California Bar in 1982 and has been named a Certified Specialist in Family Law by the State Bar of California Board of Legal Specialization.

Mr. Morris was named Best Lawyers in America - "Orange County Family Lawyer of the Year” for 2013.

Mr. Morris has been listed as a Super Lawyer since 2004. He has been listed in Best Lawyers in America since 2007, and has been listed as a Best Lawyer in Orange Coast Magazine since 2007.

name: Pamela Pierson
blurb:
Tanya E. Prioste is a partner in the Family Law Group at Lakin Spears, LLP in Palo Alto, California and a Certified Family Law Specialist, certified by the State Bar of California Board of Legal Specialization. Her practice is devoted exclusively to family law. In addition to being a litigator, Tanya acts as a mediator, collaborative counsel in Collaborative Practice cases and as a consulting counsel to mediations. She also prepares and negotiates premarital and postmarital agreements.

Tanya is rated AV® Preeminent™ by Martindale Hubbell. She has been selected by her peers as among the top family lawyers in Northern California every year since 2004 and was named one of Northern California’s “Top 50 Women Lawyers” across all practice areas in 2009, 2010, 2012 and 2013 (as surveyed by San Francisco Magazine and published in the Northern California Super Lawyers Magazine). In addition, Tanya was named one of the top 100 lawyers across all practice areas in 2010 and 2013.

Tanya has co-authored several articles on topics including attorney fees, international custody move-aways, child support, reimbursements, imputation of income and disclosure obligations.

Tanya has presented on numerous family law topics, including premarital agreements, reimbursement rights, transmutation and separate property contribution issues, fiduciary duties, and custody move-aways.
legal_orgs: Litigation, mediation, and collaborative law

name: Geniveve Ruskus
blurb:
William Ryden’s deep understanding of family law derives from more than 30 years of successfully representing clients through complex and diverse family law issues.    Jaffe and Clemens clients have benefited from his sound advice and reasoned representation since 1980, when he joined the firm.  In 1985, William became partner and since then, he has counseled many celebrities and successful business executives through difficult family decision-making, with a focus always on preserving both assets and privacy. 
 
William has been recognized by his peers and the legal community for his abilities for many years, including the Los Angeles Times Magazine’s recognition of him as a Southern California “Super Lawyer” and as one of the “Best Lawyers in America.”  His reputation as a top-notch family lawyer has earned him Martindale-Hubbell’s highest AV rating for legal ability and ethical standards. In addition, the State Bar of California has certified him a specialist in family law for more than 25 years.
legal_orgs: Traditional Client Representation and Litigation

name: Madeleine Simborg
blurb: Mr. Simpson's practice is a full service family law practice.  There are three attorneys and two paralegals.  All the staff are dedicated to achieving excellent results through trial, negotiation and/or mediation in whatever combination is best suited to meet the client's needs.  Mr. Simpson represents spouses of both genders with medium to large estates. Typical cases involve business interests, professional practices and support issues. Mr. Simpson is a court appoint special master, family law matters. Mr. Simpson has been selected to Super Laywers for many years, most recently for 2011.

name: Thomas Stabile
blurb: Mr. Staley's education and extensive experience in business and public service has provided a foundation as a family law expert, with special emphasis on settlement and litigation of complicated family law matters ranging from child custody to multi-million dollar assets.  Mr. Staley has a peer review ranking of "AV" Preeminent from Martindale-Hubbell (the highest rating in general ethical standards, legal knowledge, analytical capabilities, judgment, communication ability and legal experience).
